mapper.select: SELECT f.post_id, f.title, f.content, f.category_id, f.view_count, f.sales_status, to_char(f.created_at,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as created_at, f.price, m.user_name, f.user_id FROM fleaMarket f LEFT JOIN member m ON f.user_id = m.user_id WHERE post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fleaMarket(post_id, user_id, title, content, view_count, comment_count, category_id, sales_status, price, thumbnail) VALUES (#{post_id}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content},0, 0, #{category_id}, 0, #{price}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.update: UPDATE fleaMarket SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, created_at = sysdate, sales_status = #{sales_status}, category_id = #{category_id}, price = #{price}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail} where post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fleaMarket WHERE post_id = #{post_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
